name: DeepProfiler
title: DeepProfiler
description: Implementation and extraction of deep learning representations at the single cell level from fluorescent Images
author: Hamdah Shafqat Abbasi (hamdah.abbasi@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inputDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: maskDir
inputs.description: Input mask collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: featureDir
inputs.description: Input csv file which contains boundingbox coordinates for all cells

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Pre-trained ImageNet model to use for featurization

inputs.name: batchSize
inputs.description: Choose batchSize of cells to be used in model prediction

ui.title: Input Intensity Images
ui.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: Input Mask Images
ui.description: Input mask collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: Input Features CSV
ui.description: Choose Input CSV containing cell boundingbox coordinates
